name: Organic Opening
description: An ensemble-driven opening where performers freely move, speak, and react to a suggestion. Patterns, images, emotions, and relationships emerge organically, providing rich thematic fuel for scenes.

name: Monologue
description: A single performer shares a true, personal story inspired by the suggestion. The specificity, emotion, and point of view provide grounded material for scenes that explore similar themes or perspectives.

name: Invocation
description: Performers call out words, phrases, or short ideas inspired by the suggestion. The ensemble builds shared energy and a web of associations that can be mined for scenes.

name: Living Room
description: Performers sit casually and have a grounded, conversational discussion about the suggestion. Personal anecdotes, opinions, and tangents naturally generate scene ideas.

name: Pattern Game
description: The ensemble discovers a repeating verbal or physical pattern inspired by the suggestion. The game establishes tone and structure that can be revisited and heightened later in the show.

name: Deconstruction
description: The group explores the suggestion by breaking it down word-by-word, examining meanings, associations, and interpretations. This creates a wide thematic palette for scenes.

name: Rant
description: One performer delivers a passionate, opinionated rant inspired by the suggestion. Strong emotion and clear point of view help launch bold, character-driven scenes.

name: Interview
description: One performer interviews another who plays a character, expert, or person connected to the suggestion. The interview reveals details, stakes, and relationships that inspire scenes.

name: Slideshow
description: The ensemble creates a series of frozen images inspired by the suggestion while a narrator describes each "slide." The visuals and narration establish characters, locations, and story ideas.

name: Documentary
description: Performed in the style of a documentary, this opening uses talking heads, narration, and reenactments to build a fictional world around the suggestion.

name: Conducted Story
description: A conductor guides multiple performers as they collaboratively tell a story inspired by the suggestion. The focus is on shared narrative, pacing, and group listening.

name: News Report
description: Performers present a satirical news broadcast inspired by the suggestion, featuring anchors, reporters, and experts. The format quickly establishes a world full of scene potential.
